title: 請求能夠打機既手提電腦

replies.msg:
電競類
最好black friday有特價
筆直5000樓下或者相近

另外想問
2599$ 32吋 2k 144hz 1ms 曲mon
同2999$ 27吋 4k 60hz 5ms 直mon
會簡邊一隻呢
好似pc 2080同ps5都係帶唔動4k 60fps?

嘩budget 好少…
事先聲明，美國用兩腳插，用轉插可能好危險，最好自己配條線。
喺美國Amazon買used，你就最好自救多福，如果賣家漏咗啲咩，都有排煩，重有唔知點保養，可能要寄返去美國。
如果有多啲Budget，買new sold by Amazon 有一年全球保重好…
強烈建議入呢個睇多啲，同問下先
https://lihkg.com/thread/2299356/page/1
或者去二手交易post睇下有無人放…
https://lihkg.com/thread/2209037/page/1


以下係不付責任嘅搜尋結果，完全唔知部機散熱好唔好，個keybroad 好唔好撳等等。
btw 1650 你就唔好預有幾勁，自己去check 下隻Game 用1650 玩唔玩到，畫質、frame rate可唔可以接受，咁嘅價錢唔好太多幻想，一分錢一分貨。多啲budget會好啲…

btw new sold by Amazon 都係5532 好似有全球保，又係新嘅，好似好啲

https://www.amazon.com/gp/offer-listing/B07VBK4SYS/ref=dp_olp_ALL_mbc?ie=UTF8&condition=ALL

replies.msg: 香港格價網好多搵唔到依隻型號既？

256gb 可能唔夠用，打機時keyboard 位可能會接近50-60度，個mon 可能望落無144hz。

from amazon review
The LCD panel is model "NCP004D" from Panda. A reviewer at NotebookCheck tested that display panel, and found a Black to White response time of 16.8ms, and a White to Black response time of 13.2ms, for a round-trip total of 30ms. This means that despite being 144Hz, the time it takes for the pixels to fade in and out makes it look no better than a 60FPS display. While testing a scrolling image, 72 FPS and 144 FPS looked indistinguishable, as well as 60FPS and 120FPS looking indistinguishable as well.
The AN515-44-R5FT also has the same LCD panel, and I was only able to discover this information by reading reviews of that product.
There's also some backlight bleed, but it's only noticeable in a dark room with a dark screen. The backlight bleed was not annoying enough to be a problem.
Additionally, the display is only 6-bit color, not 8-bit.

Aside from the disappointing LCD screen, it has great components inside.

replies.msg: 你係香港買得一定貴d，唔係點解上面po親都Amazon，邊個唔知香港買方便，快又唔駛煩咩

2599$ 32吋 2k 144hz 1ms 曲mon

我都見到 想買
但運費六舊幾水

香港買算

你識嘅話，可以自己加，好似重有一個m2位同一個sata 位。
如果送人、幫人買就唔建議買水貨。
如果自用，買水貨就要考慮有無全球保，有QC問題都唔使寄返去。
香港好多型號都無行同唔平，水貨係平啲，但好睇運數。
Acer 係無全球保，所以要承擔風險。


btw 你個mon 壞咗，買多個mon就得，點解想買notebook？部desktop廢？
